@Version("1.0")

Package org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations

A set of annotations, many derived from Swagger Core library. OpenAPI annotations can be augmented with existing JAX-RS annotations in an application to produce a valid OpenAPI document. Examples of annotations in this package include:
  • Components
  • ExternalDocumentation
  • OpenAPIDefinition
  • Operation

Example of usage: 

  @GET
  @Path("/findByStatus")
  @Operation(summary = "Finds Pets by status",
            description = "Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings")
  public Response findPetsByStatus(...) { ... }
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Components
    Describes the Components object that holds various reusable objects for different aspects of the OpenAPI Specification (OAS).
    ExternalDocumentation
    This annotation allows referencing an external resource for extended documentation.
    OpenAPIDefinition
    OpenAPI
    Operation
    Describes a single API operation on a path.
